name: Geo'Chase
description:
You are a round player that shoots bullets automatically (as well as skills), and you need to survive the longest you can while enmies chase you. You gain experience by shooting enemies down, and can choose an upgrade from 3 randomised proposal when leveling up. You can also move to the "Other Side" for 3 seconds to escape your foes. Good luck !

It is best played Full Screen ;)

You can change shortcuts inside the "Settings" menu.

Escape : Pause the game and change settings on the go.

ZQSD : Move the player.

Space : Go to the Other Side to escape the enemies for 3 seconds.
